website_summaries.verdict: The iPad Air 2 balances seamless ease of use, app abundance, and raw power in its ever-so-slender frame, continuing Apple's reign atop the tablet heap.
pros: Best app design and selection of any platform
Cellular models can be switched between wireless carriers in software

customer_reviews.title: It's an absolute belter of an iPad Air 2.
customer_reviews.text: Looked on Amazon for a while for a new iPad, found this one, however I read some not so good reviews, mine did come with a uk plug and it did say iPad Air 2 on the packaging. I'm not a easily pleased kind of guy but ticks all the boxes. It's a absolute belter of an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Birnie

customer_reviews.title: Ipad2
customer_reviews.text: The price for this was great saved about £70. I would suggest getting a bigger storage version as 16gb is very easy to fill up. It's light and easy to use and a big step up from the Other iPads I was using. I like that it came brand new with a uk charger and it is now my favourite tablet. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: phillip underwood

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad, bought for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great iPad, bought for my son. He loves it. I bought it with confidence having read many product comparisons and reviews and am very happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Giraffe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I run one specific work application on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I run one specific work application on it, so didn't need the bigger storage. If it was for personal use, I would suggest getting something bigger than a 16GB version.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this purchase which was just as I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this purchase which was just as I expected and with a price some £30 cheaper than a leading store. On reflection, I would consider the larger memory if I were buying this item again simply because with so many apps available it is not that difficult to use 16GB.
customer_reviews.author: KeithO

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is better than I ever imagined
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is better than I ever imagined. It oozes quality. I'm extremely happy with my purchase. I wish it had an SD card reader though...
customer_reviews.author: Shard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, as expected from Apple
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit, as you would expect from Apple. I love apple tech as its just so easy to use and more secure than Android. Enough storage for doing all the things someone who is not a techie kind of person needs.
customer_reviews.author: Alexcsb

customer_reviews.title: excellent very easy to use wonderful screen I am extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent very easy to use wonderful screen I am extremely pleased with my purchase which is having a lot of use It also goes well with my BOSE Sound Link which gives an extra boost to the sound via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: CHMCM

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Note the capacity is 16GB and the current model is 32 for more or less the same price
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: The iPad itself is really great but when it comes to charging it.. It takes about 30 minutes for it to go up to only 10%. I'm not sure if it's because it's from the U.S but the charging really is a pain. Apart from that I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what I had read, this ipad came with U.K charger and everything. Came in the box, unopened. Arrived before the date it said would arrive, very promptly. I am very very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: She is delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my wife as a replacement for an older version. She is delighted with it. So am I although I rarely get to use it, but oh the peace and quiet>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon for ever

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, well packed, easy to download data from old I pad on to this air pad 2. Very reasonable price,

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refurb'd over a year ago and it's still working perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Came with a 3pin UK plug, unlike some saying ...

customer_reviews.text: Not a UK iPad. Imported, an Apple plug supplied but isn't the official iPad plug. Only an iPhone one so a lot slower.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely iPad

customer_reviews.title: This is an Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Word of warning, it doesnt say AIR 2 anywhere on the product or the box or the booklet, in fact the only way i can tell its not just a standard Air is that it has finger print recognitio THe Air 2 is amazing one of the best bits of technology i have ever bought, am building my wedding website on it and its a doddle I read all the reviews for this and its Andriod competitors, and although it may not have all the specs of the others its also not preloaded with loads of nonesense youll never use and anything that isnt there you can easily find
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. P. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Blows competition out of the water
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as my Christmas present as I thought it was too expensive and had previously bought a cheaper brand. I am very price sensitive much to my husbands annoyance sometimes but I have to say this blows the competition out of the water....so on this occasion I have to say hubby you were right(never to be repeated!) I never have this out of my hands, it's great for everything from social media to streaming videos and games. Apple I will never doubt your value again 😃
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Berriff

customer_reviews.title: It's an ipad air 2!
customer_reviews.text: Apple are renown for their ipads and this is no exception. Except for maybe the Samsung tab s, and it's a hotly debated topic, this is probably one of the best tablets you can get. It's light with a good battery life and does all the things a tablet should do and more. The one downside is there is no flash for the camera. Altogether though, a thoroughly good piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Heathfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughther fell in love with it and play it all day at Christmas day

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my mark one iPad. My mark one is beginning to lose some of its functionality particularly on news web sites. The new one is fine, seems slightly neater than the old but to be honest if the old one hadn't started to fail I would have stuck with it.

customer_reviews.title: Bet you'll love the apple iPad air 2

customer_reviews.title: My husband was delighted with his present
customer_reviews.text: My husband was delighted with his present . Lightweight,fast and it answers your question immediately, although with my husband, being a Scotsman, the machine is not used to his accent!!! Thankyou. Margaret Kane.

customer_reviews.text: I had just saved myself from spending £70 pounds as the same product at the apple store was valued at £400.00 exact. The Ipad air 2 is amazing and what made the process of purchasing one even better was the price which I paid for it.

customer_reviews.title: Supplier sent EU plug!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ipad, but the supplier sent it with a European apple plug rather than a UK plug (they sent a small cheap UK adapter) but means charging is a lot slower.

customer_reviews.title: very prompt service have bought twice now happy with both purchases would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: very prompt service have bought twice now happy with both purchases would definitely purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for an older model , very slim and light and a lot faster , good buy
customer_reviews.author: paul johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Apple
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Everything it says "on the tin" Comes very well packaged and presented. Colour great and the actual iPad is first class. Easy to get started and loving everything about it! Worth every penny...get it if you can!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not normally sucked in by Apple hype but.....
customer_reviews.text: What did we ever do before iPads? I'm not a tech head, I can just tell you I love it and want to marry it and live with me forever. My husband says I pay it more attention than I pay him (probably true!) and he has a serious case of iPad envy. In an age of instant gratification it's just so nice to not have to log on to a laptop and have everything at your fingertips. 6 months on and I've not found any negatives. J'Adore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have tried finding out how to send it back for repair like walking through a maze
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this Apple iPAD Air 2 since the 21st September 2015. For the last two weeks it continues to freeze. I have taken it to an Apple outlet and they cannot seem to solve the problem. I have tried finding out how to send it back for repair like walking through a maze, I wish I had bought a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Greenyer

customer_reviews.title: Best of luck with that one
customer_reviews.text: The product came without any form of user advice (manual/set up) at all. Apple must assume that their clients already are familiar with the product you have just brought from them. More than a touch of arrogance from Apple, I feel. I have had to send off for an after market guide to using this device fully so as of now I cannot comment on its capabilities. There is immediately a problem with the device not deleting e-mails that I have to sort out. Ever tried contacting Apple ????? Best of luck with that one !!! I would not have purchased this product knowing what I know now.
customer_reviews.author: Barney W

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant IPad Air2
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son (18) and he is really pleased with it. He say's it is easy to use, has everything on it that he needs, and will be so handy to use in class when he goes to Uni for making notes, enquiries, (and games), etc. It is extremely slim, a great colour (grey) and the screen colours are amazing and vibrant. Very pleased with buy!
customer_reviews.author: NooNoo

customer_reviews.title: Bent iPad!
customer_reviews.text: Opened my factory sealed box to find a bent iPad! Sending back for a refund and going to Apple instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tez R.

customer_reviews.title: Wifi connection issues: item returned
customer_reviews.text: I finally upgraded from my iPad 2 and first impressions were great with the higher resolution and lighter weight. The wifi connection kept dropping though whilst the old iPad 2 and my partners iPad Air 1 had no problems. Following Apple fixes made no difference so I am returning the item to Amazon and will live with my old iPad until the next version comes out.
customer_reviews.author: GG9

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says on the sealed Apple IPad box
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews on Amazon, but after reading other reviews and opting to have faith, here it is. Some reviewers cast doubt over authenticity, or that it came with a two pin plug. Well, mine arrived next day and I can happily report it was, indeed, a sealed Apple IPad box which held a brand new iPad Air 2, as ordered, with three pin European plug. Absolutely cannot fault anything about my experience. I hope this review is useful to someone such as myself reading reviews and contemplating their purchase. I have no qualms recommending based upon my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Eseker

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but 16 G storage is too small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but 16 G storage is too small as there are only about 11 G can be used. Refund mine to get a 32 G one.

customer_reviews.title: 2 pin charger not suitable for UK use
customer_reviews.text: ipad charger enclosed in sealed box is 2 pin and not suitable for UK use. An additional 3 pin plug was sent with order but not apple product. Very slow charge with black charger as low wattage. Not described on Amazon as an imported ipad

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this iPad, it has exceeded our expectations, and the service from Apple has been super. Would definitely recommend this product.
